Text: By passing the MINER Act today, we are protecting more than ten thousand jobs and billions of dollars in revenue and education funding, while leaving an extensive process intact to protect and preserve the environment and our state.pic.twitter.com/CdWHozTeKP

The time has come to put healthcare back in the hands of the American people by allowing them to choose their own doctors and coverage.
In MN, Blue Cross Blue Shield suffered major losses as a result of Obamacare’s failures, forcing them to drop individual plans.
As a result of these rising costs, many families have opted to go uninsured, rather than pay for these skyrocketing costs.
In MN alone, premiums have increased nearly 67% for 2017. Minnesotan families cannot, and should not, have to shoulder those costs.
